description: This Dart source file defines the OrdersProvider class, which manages order data and simulates placing orders in a restaurant frontend app. It maintains a list of orders, provides access to them, and includes a method to place new orders with simulated network delay.

classes.name: OrdersProvider
classes.description: A class that provides order management functionality, including storing and placing orders.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: An asynchronous method to create a new order, simulate network delay, assign a unique ID, add it to the order list, and notify listeners.
